content: The GForge project homepage (http://gforge.hl7.org/gf/project/fhir/) is a bit dated and looks like it could use a bit of grooming. Can someone with the access take a look. Also, the 'Recent News' on there references an article from 2014. Pretty sure that's not recent anymore.
It's hard to make gForge not look "dated", but I've updated the content at least. And stripped 'Recent News' as that's not a mechanism we typically use.
Styling aside, that's much better. Thanks @Lloyd McKenzie .
Thanks for providing the poke @Kevin Olbrich :)
